meanings.definition: Suggestions made in response to a previous suggestion, typically in disagreement.
meanings.sent1: After the meeting, there were many countersuggestions from the team members.
meanings.sent2: She always listens to countersuggestions before making a final decision.
meanings.sent3: The countersuggestions at the debate made everyone rethink their opinions.
meanings.sent4: His constant countersuggestions were like a never-ending debate.
meanings.sent5: The countersuggestions echoed in the room, creating a lively discussion.

meanings.definition: To offer an alternative suggestion in response to a previous suggestion.
meanings.sent1: I will countersuggest a different approach to solve the problem.
meanings.sent2: They decided to countersuggest a new plan for the project.
meanings.sent3: He likes to countersuggest just to keep things interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to countersuggest creatively impressed the team.
meanings.sent5: The team members were encouraged to countersuggest freely during the brainstorming session.
